body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Paul Turner. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Kayla. How may I assist you today? Can you kindly provide me with your phone number and address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five four six eight two three one zero and my address is two one zero Pine Street, Oakville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Kayla. I will now review your account to address any concerns you may have.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Paul. I'm feeling happy that we are resolving this billing issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kayla. Your satisfaction is our top priority. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything else seems fine now. Thank you, Paul.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kayla. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
